english.segment1: Life is full of light and shadow. O the joy and O the sorrow. O the sorrow
english.segment2: And yet will He bring. Dark to light. And yet will He bring. Day from night
english.segment3: When shadows fall on us. We will not fear. We will remember
english.segment4: When darkness falls on us. We will not fear. We will remember
english.segment5: When all seems lost. When we're thrown and we're tossed. We remember the cost. We rest in Him. Shadow of the cross
